page.title: 12FARMING AROUND SKELMERSDALE
page.content: HOW LONG HAVE YOU MANAGED THE FARM? My brother and I worked here as young men.We took over management from our father about 10 years ago. HOW BIG IS YOUR FARM? Medium size . We farm 170 acres. WHAT KIND OF FARM IS IT? It is an arable farm _ we grow crops. WHAT ARE YOUR MAIN CROPS? About 50% of our annual crop is cereals. That is wheat, barley and peas. The peas are used for animal feed. The rest of the land is used for potatoes and other vegetables such as cauliflower and broccoli. HOW MANY HELPERS DO YOU EMPLOY? We have 2 full time workers and 1 part _time. WHAT TIME DO YOU START WORK? We work from 8 a.m. till 5 p.m. usually.
